page.title: 04St.John's Church.
page.content: The Rev.R.Teare told us that he has been Rector of St.John's Church for two and a half years. The church was built as a pilgrim church not a parish church. It is made of local stone and flint. Rev.R.Teare felt that God was calling him to be a Priest.The area that the church serves is nine square miles that is mostly fields.The church had a lepers gallery and squints for the children to look through the screen.900 years ago there would be no glass in the windows, there were just holes to let in light.There were pews around the walls for the weak and the old.There was no electricity. There would have been two or three books which would have been copied out by hand.The Mayor ,various Bishops and the Dean of Winchester are important people that have been here to the church.
